sentences.sContent: It is a mass-producer of banality.
sentences.sCn: 这是陈腐平庸的大规模制造者。

sentences.sContent: Hence， the limited perspective of active and energetic people, the banality of their thought and actions.
sentences.sContent_eng: Hence， the limited perspective of active and energetic people, the banality of their thought and actions.
sentences.sCn: 因此，有限的行动前途，精力充沛的人，他们想法以及行动的陈腐。

words.tran: 陈腐的；平庸的；老一套的
